title: Sion Ascension Bug
body:
I Played a game with sion {{champion:14}}  on ascension . While I was playing I died and activated my passive. The enemy team killed Xerath And I went in and Get ascented as sion passive. What Happened next Is I was unable to die. They hit me all the could but they couldn't kill me.
This is a game breaking Bug and should be fixed

replies.body:
I missed replying to this thread, but had posted on some of the other reports of this bug.  Sorry about that!

We are checking it out, but not sure what the steps are to reproduce it just yet.  Thanks for the report on this!

EDIT: nevermind, read the second edit below
------------------------------------------------ 
I did that with Sion's passive since Ascension was live, it is not a bug and definitely not game breaking. In reality you have a small window to make it work, in a lot of cases your passive just expires and somebody else gets ascended. You can do the same trick with Kog-maw. 
But honestly, as Sion, you get a bigger chance to get ascended, but so does volibear, who just flips you right out of your spot.
------------------------------------------------

EDIT: Yeah, I felt like you meant that Sion's passive doesn't deserve to be Ascended but what you meant is  he doesn't take any damage, huh. I've ascended my passive tons of times and it never happened in previous patches.
